title: Error in doc/contribute.html
body:
by **micah.stetson**: 
Golang.org/doc/contribute.html, under the heading Testing Redux, says to 
run this:

    cd $GOROOT/src
    make all

This fails because there's no Makefile in $GOROOT/src, I believe it should be 
this:

    cd $GOROOT/src
    ./all.bash
